meanings.definition: To surpass in design or creativity.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys outdesigning her friends when it comes to drawing.
meanings.sent2: The new architect is known for outdesigning all others in the industry.
meanings.sent3: The competition was fierce, but she ended up outdesigning everyone with her unique ideas.
meanings.sent4: His innovative approach to outdesigning traditional methods has revolutionized the field.
meanings.sent5: The young artist dreams of outdesigning even the most famous designers one day.

meanings.definition: The act of creating a design that is superior to others.
meanings.sent1: Her outdesigning of the logo impressed the entire team.
meanings.sent2: The outdesigning of the building's interior was truly remarkable.
meanings.sent3: The outdesigning of the cake made it the highlight of the party.
meanings.sent4: His outdesigning of the car's engine made it more efficient than ever.
meanings.sent5: The outdesigning of the website attracted a lot of new visitors.
